html:
Telenor ASA, a Norway-based company that provides integrated telecommunications services, has partnered with Amazon Web Services Inc, a US-based provider of cloud computing services, to accelerate modernization of telecommunications

As part of the agreement, Telenor and Amazon Web Services will invest in joint go-to-market activities in select industries such as manufacturing, supply chain and logistics, and automotive, to enable more 5G and edge services for customers.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypePartnership
Sub-CategoryCo-development
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-01-20

Deal Participants

Partner 1 (Company)Amazon Web Services, Inc.
Partner 2 (Company)Telenor ASA

Deal Rationale
